reviews.review_msg: Okay, this guy is really professional and he is very very smart!!!! Also, he listens to all points of view, even opinions he disagrees with.  Also, he marks tests and assignments very quickly...often he posts the marks within 24 hours!!! I would recommend him

He gives out participation marks based on whether he likes you or not, and not whether or not you have actually participated meaningfully to class discussions.  Some of the best participators got poor participation marks, simply because this guy doesn't like their opinions!!!!!!!
